languages.text: "Дела, что рассматриваются во Дворце Правосудия, это в буквальном смысле вопросы жизни и смерти. Всегда есть виновная сторона, что ложью, попустительством или небрежением нанесла ущерб протекторату. Задача судьи — выявить виновных и вынести суровый приговор, поскольку без него и показательной казни невозможно диктовать порядок".

"The cases litigated at the Palace of Justice quite literally concern matters of life and death. In such instances, there is always a guilty party whose lies, connivances, or negligence have caused damage to the protectorate. The task of the judge is to establish guilt and pass a stern sentence, as order cannot be imposed without these, or without summary executions."
languages.original_text: "Дела, что рассматриваются во Дворце Правосудия, это в буквальном смысле вопросы жизни и смерти. The task of the judges is to establish guilt and pass a stern sentence, as order cannot be imposed without those, or without summary executions."

languages.text: "Bei den im Justizpalast behandelten Fällen geht es buchstäblich um Leben und Tod. Das heißt, es gibt stets eine schuldige Partei, deren Lügen, Mitwisserschaft oder Nachlässigkeit dem Protektorat geschadet hat. Der Richter hat die Aufgabe, die Schuld festzustellen und ein strenges Urteil zu erlassen, da die Ordnung ohne Strenge oder Exekutionen nicht gewahrt werden kann."
languages.original_text: "The cases litigated at the Palace of Justice quite literally concern matters of life and death. In such instances, there is always a guilty party whose lies, connivances, or negligence have caused damage to the protectorate. The task of the judge is to establish guilt and pass a stern sentence, as order cannot be imposed without these, or without summary executions."

traits.locale_text: "Bei den im Justizpalast behandelten Fällen geht es buchstäblich um Leben und Tod. Das heißt, es gibt stets eine schuldige Partei, deren Lügen, Mitwisserschaft oder Nachlässigkeit dem Protektorat geschadet hat. Der Richter hat die Aufgabe, die Schuld festzustellen und ein strenges Urteil zu erlassen, da die Ordnung ohne Strenge oder Exekutionen nicht gewahrt werden kann."

languages.text: « Les affaires traitées dans ce palais de justice ont trait à des questions de vie ou de mort, sans exagération. Dans de tels cas, il y a toujours un coupable qui ment, des connivences ou des négligences qui ont causé des dommages au protectorat. Le juge a pour rôle de déterminer le responsable du crime commis et de lui infliger une sentence intransigeante, une nécessité pour imposer l'ordre au même titre que les exécutions sommaires. »
languages.original_text: "The cases litigated at the Palace of Justice quite literally concern matters of life and death. In such instances, there is always a guilty party whose lies, connivances, or negligence have caused damage to the protectorate. The task of the judge is to establish guilt and pass a stern sentence, as order cannot be imposed without these, or without summary executions."

traits.locale_text: « Les affaires traitées dans ce palais de justice ont trait à des questions de vie ou de mort, sans exagération. Dans de tels cas, il y a toujours un coupable qui ment, des connivences ou des négligences qui ont causé des dommages au protectorat. Le juge a pour rôle de déterminer le responsable du crime commis et de lui infliger une sentence intransigeante, une nécessité pour imposer l'ordre au même titre que les exécutions sommaires. »

languages.text: “在正义大殿审理的案件事关生死，这一点毫不夸张，因为每个案件的涉事双方之中，肯定有一方有罪。犯罪方的谎言、纵容、疏忽，已经对王朝造成了危害。在这种情况下，仲裁官必须找出有罪的一方，做出严厉的判决。若是未能下达判决，或未能即刻处决犯人，恐怕秩序也将不复存在。”
languages.original_text: "The cases litigated at the Palace of Justice quite literally concern matters of life and death. In such instances, there is always a guilty party whose lies, connivances, or negligence have caused damage to the protectorate. The task of the judge is to establish guilt and pass a stern sentence, as order cannot be imposed without these, or without summary executions."

traits.locale_text: “在正义大殿审理的案件事关生死，这一点毫不夸张，因为每个案件的涉事双方之中，肯定有一方有罪。犯罪方的谎言、纵容、疏忽，已经对王朝造成了危害。在这种情况下，仲裁官必须找出有罪的一方，做出严厉的判决。若是未能下达判决，或未能即刻处决犯人，恐怕秩序也将不复存在。”

languages.text: «Los casos que se juzgan en el Palacio de la Justicia son literalmente cuestión de vida o muerte. En estos casos, siempre hay una parte culpable cuyas mentiras, conspiraciones o negligencia han afectado al protectorado. La labor del juez es establecer la culpa y dictar una sentencia, ya que es tan necesario para mantener el orden como las ejecuciones sumarias».
languages.original_text: "The cases litigated at the Palace of Justice quite literally concern matters of life and death. In such instances, there is always a guilty party whose lies, connivances, or negligence have caused damage to the protectorate. The task of the judge is to establish guilt and pass a stern sentence, as order cannot be imposed without these, or without summary executions."

traits.locale_text: «Los casos que se juzgan en el Palacio de la Justicia son literalmente cuestión de vida o muerte. En estos casos, siempre hay una parte culpable cuyas mentiras, conspiraciones o negligencia han afectado al protectorado. La labor del juez es establecer la culpa y dictar una sentencia, ya que es tan necesario para mantener el orden como las ejecuciones sumarias».

languages.text: 「司法宮で審理される事件は、文字通り、生死を分ける重大事でございます。このような場合、嘘や共謀、あるいは過失により保護領に損害をもたらした罪ある者が、必ず存在いたします。裁判官の責務は、その有罪を明らかにし、厳正なる判決を下すことにございます。それなくしては秩序は保たれず、必要な即時処刑も執行できません」
languages.original_text: "The cases litigated at the Palace of Justice quite literally concern matters of life and death. In such instances, there is always a guilty party whose lies, connivances, or negligence have caused damage to the protectorate. The task of the judge is to establish guilt and pass a stern sentence, as order cannot be imposed without these, or without summary executions."

traits.locale_text: 「司法宮で審理される事件は、文字通り、生死を分ける重大事でございます。このような場合、嘘や共謀、あるいは過失により保護領に損害をもたらした罪ある者が、必ず存在いたします。裁判官の責務は、その有罪を明らかにし、厳正なる判決を下すことにございます。それなくしては秩序は保たれず、必要な即時処刑も執行できません」

languages.text: "Adalet Sarayı'nda görülen davalar, kelimenin tam manasıyla hayat memat mevzularıdır. Bu gibi hâllerde daima suçlu bir taraf vardır. Suçlu tarafın yalanları, zımni muvafakati yahut ihmali protektoraya zarar vermiştir. Yargıcın vazifesi ise suçu tespit edip ağır hükmü irat etmektir çünkü nizam, bu hükümler ve icabında yargısız infazlar olmaksızın tesis edilemez."
languages.original_text: "The cases litigated at the Palace of Justice quite literally concern matters of life and death. In such instances, there is always a guilty party whose lies, connivances, or negligence have caused damage to the protectorate. The task of the judge is to establish guilt and pass a stern sentence, as order cannot be imposed without these, or without summary executions."
